text.text:
Good health is essential for longevity and quality of life. At Menarini Asia-Pacific, we seek to empower happier, healthier living by advancing healthcare across the region through our diverse therapeutic portfolio.

Fuelling our efforts are our values that define how we conduct ourselves as individuals and as a company every day. Guided by these values, we embody an entrepreneurial spirit and the drive to relentlessly pursue opportunities to positively impact patients’ lives.

text_copy_copy_copy_.text: Our eight key values together with our vision and brand promise, drive all that we do:

embed_copy_copy.html:
Stay curious and ask questions. Making new discoveries opens ourselves up to what is possible, uncovers opportunities and helps us to grow. Our curiosity fuels curiosity in others, encourages a learning mindset and a desire to understand others.

Passion dares us to dream and opens up a world of unending possibilities. Passion fosters innovation and can turn dreams into reality. We run the extra mile without needing to ask why. Passion motivates others and fuels entrepreneurship.

Our identity and what we do together with colleagues and partners are driven by our consuming focus on patient and consumer outcomes, delight and satisfaction. Being patient centric builds trust with all our stakeholders.

We value speed and agility, and despise bureaucracy. We embrace change quickly, adapt and grow. We are goals-and-outcomes focused. We act swiftly and decisively to make things happen.

Our company is centered around the Person. We care deeply about each other and support the well-being, growth and development of our fellow employees. We respect and safeguard the environment around us to allow a better life for our children.

We demonstrate trust and respect for every person so that they can feel safe and be their authentic selves. Respecting our differences makes us stronger together. We value equal opportunities for all, recognising that our inclusiveness allows us to learn from each other.

We do what we say and always strive to do what is right. We act with uncompromising integrity and espouse to attain the highest ethical standards in our products, services and our daily work. We abide by the laws of the land and fully respect and embrace the Company’s Code of Conduct and Policies on Ethics & Integrity.

Quality is the hallmark of Menarini’s products and services, in which our patients and consumers trust wholeheartedly and why they stay loyal. We strive for the highest product quality that is unsurpassed by industry standards to achieve desired patient outcomes. We perform our work professionally, exceeding expectations to give our customers the assurance that they can depend on us unreservedly.

banner_v2_copy.jcr:description: Every day, we put our values into action - four values that have given life to Menarini and shaped its history.
banner_v2_copy.jcr:title: MENARINI GROUP'S VALUES

text.text:
身体健康对于长寿和生活质量至关重要。在美纳里尼亚太公司，我们致力于通过丰富多样的治疗产品组合在整个地区推进医疗保健发展，从而让人们过上更幸福、更健康的生活

再接再厉的精神孕育了我们的价值观，定义了我们作为个人和公司每天应如何行事。这些价值观体现了我们的企业家精神和不懈努力，我们始终寻求机会，为患者的生活带来积极影响。

text_copy_copy_copy_.text: 我们的八个核心价值观与我们的愿景和品牌承诺一起，推动我们的一切工作：

embed_copy_copy.html:
保持好奇，擅于提问。探索新发现，让我们接纳一切可能，发现机遇并得以成长。我们的好奇心激发他人的好奇心，鼓励好学心态，促进相互理解。

热情使我们敢于梦想，为我们开启一个充满无限可能的世界。热情孕育创新，能使梦想成真。我们毫不迟疑地加倍努力。热情激励他人，激发创业精神。

一心关注患者和消费者的疗效、愉悦感和满意度，成就我们的立身之本以及与同道共事的立业之基。以患者为中心，与所有利益相关方共建互信。

我们重视速度与灵活度，鄙视官僚主义。我们快速拥抱变化、适应变化并在变化中成长。我们专注于实现目标和取得成果。我们迅速、果敢地采取行动，从而有所作为。

我们公司以人为本。我们深切地关怀彼此，支持员工的福利、成长和发展。我们尊重和保护我们周围的环境，为我们的后代创造更美好的生活。

我们信任与尊重每一个人，让他们感到安全，做真实的自己。尊重大家的特点，和则兴，众则强。我们强调所有人机会均等，并认为彼此包容才能相互学习。

我们言出必行，始终努力做正确的事。我们毫不妥协地诚信行事，并在我们的产品、服务和日常工作中恪守最高的道德标准。我们遵纪守法，并完全遵守和拥护公司的《行为规范》和《道德和诚信政策》。

品质是美纳里尼产品和服务的特色标志，是赢得患者和消费者全心信赖的根源，也是维持顾客忠诚度的缘由。我们努力追求最高的产品质量标准，超越行业标准，达到令人期待的治疗效果。我们以专业的方式开展工作，超越预期，让我们的客户确信，他们可以完全信赖我们。

banner_v2_copy.jcr:description: 日复一日，我们将我们的价值观付诸行动——四大价值观赋予美纳里尼生命并塑造其历史。
banner_v2_copy.jcr:title: 美纳里尼集团
